name: Asathera's Chronicles: Embrace of Solace
description:
Eons ago, humans and Apheba, Supernatural beings, lived together in harmony, until an Apheba named Asathera began to believe humans were nothing but a lowly race.

After a betrayal of their closest advisors/generals, a group of witches were able to seal and separate Asathera's body parts.

It has been centuries and the Apheba live incognito from the humans, most of their ploys being made into stories for entertainment.

The story takes place in the life of a young human woman named Abner, who only gets involved with the Apheba after bad luck leaves her with an amulet that holds Asathera's heart.

Abner now finds her fate left in the hands of the APB, Apheba Police Bureau, and a few other interesting characters.
